channel.title: Server Trouble: Character Files
channel.description:
I'm having trouble with creating character files on my server and can't login
If i enter a new username & password this comes up: [code]null null null null Connection from b***:3*5* null James: character file not found. null null null null null[/code]
and if i create a character file and try to login with that character, it always says invalid username & password.
help appreciate
thx XD

item.title: Server Trouble: Character Files
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:12, topic:232855”]I think this is the 4th thread I’ve seen ask about the null on delta. Look for a tutorial or a download that has it already.[/quote]5th, and counting for this week.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Trouble: Character Files
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“jensie, post:4, topic:226655”][quote author=WrittenBlade link=topic=297858.msg2393566#msg2393566 date=1219061636]
I feel sorry for the people who got the anti-leech Deltascape. I got the regular one.
[/quote]You shouldn’t, I also have the regular one, but the anti leech isn’t hard at all, I solved it for a friend.[/quote]

Jensie, can you please help me with the anti-leach?

Read full topic

item.title: Server Trouble: Character Files
item.dc:creator: @bloomie bloomie
item.description:
@bloomie wrote:

I’m having trouble with creating character files on my server and can’t login

If i enter a new username & password this comes up:

null null null null Connection from b***:3*5* null James: character file not found. null null null null null

and if i create a character file and try to login with that character, it always says invalid username & password.

help appreciate

thx XD
